SELECT /* getListPrmMapRtnMap+@com.vilio.nlbs.commonMapper.sql.NlbsTodoMapper.xml */ nt.ID AS id /* 数据主键 */ ,nt.DATE_CREATED AS dateCreated /* 任务创建时间（分配时间） */ ,nt.CONTENT AS content /* 待办任务详情 */ ,nt.TODO_TYPE AS todoType /* 待办任务类型 */ ,ntt.name AS todoName ,nt.USER_NO AS userNo /* 待处理人 */ ,nt.user_full_name AS userName ,nt.BPS_CODE AS serialNo /* 询价系统序列号 */ FROM NLBS_TODO nt /* 待办任务列表 */ JOIN nlbs_todo_type ntt ON nt.todo_type = ntt.code WHERE nt.USER_NO = #{userNo}
AND nt.date_created > concat(#{startDate} , ' 00:00:00')
AND concat(#{endDate} , ' 23:59:59') > nt.date_created
AND nt.CONTENT LIKE concat('%', #{content}, '%')
AND nt.TODO_TYPE = #{todoType} /* 待办任务类型 */
AND nt.BPS_CODE = #{serialNo} /* 询价系统序列号 */
ORDER BY nt.date_created DESC
SELECT ntt.code AS todoTypeCode, ntt.name AS todoTypeNode FROM nlbs_todo_type ntt

SELECT nt.TODO_TYPE AS todoType, case nt.TODO_TYPE when '001' then concat('有',cast(count(1) as char),'条询价评估待处理。') when '002' then concat('有',cast(count(1) as char),'条进件申请待提交。') else '' end as content, case nt.TODO_TYPE when '001' then concat(cast(count(1) as char),'条询价评估') when '002' then concat(cast(count(1) as char),'条进件申请') else '' end as keyWords, count(1) count FROM NLBS_TODO nt WHERE nt.user_no = #{userNo} GROUP BY nt.todo_type;
